Text: First, Click “CTA Canvas” from left menu
Click “CTA Area Mapping”
Click “Insert a Hotspot Area”
Adjust the box to the correct size and position
Click Button “URL” from left menu
Enter a title name
Enter the website URL you want to link
Click to confirm
Click Preview Button on top right
Click Preview Button on top right
Open the Preview window
Click Hotspot area you created
Now you can access the website you entered
Now try to click “Select URL from VinMobi”
Choose one VinMobi Site and Confirm
Click Preview Button on top right
Open the Preview window
Click Hotspot area you created
Now you can access the Vinmobi site you choose
Now try to click “Select URL from VinDesk”
Now try to click “Select URL from VinDesk”
Choose one VinMobi Site and Confirm
Click Preview Button on top right
Click Hotspot area you created
Now you can access the VinDesk site you choose
First, Create a hotspot area
Click “Flicker” on the right
Click “Click” on the right
Click to Preview
Now you can see the area of the hotspot flickering
OK, now we can try other display setting
Here change to “Hover”
Click “Preview”
You will see the hotspot doesn't respond until you hover the mouse over it
Here change to “Hidden”
Click “Preview”
This time hotspot doesn't respond even you hover the mouse over itBut you still can click the hotspot area
